src/lambdas.src: Source files for individual lambdas - index.ts
src/lambdas.test: Unit tests for each lambda - index.test.ts

Important utilities and data structures.apigateway-helpers.ts: Utility functions for lambdas behind an API Gateway
Important utilities and data structures.constraints.ts: Constraint settings for the validate.js module - for validation of lambda inputs
Important utilities and data structures.dynamodb-helpers.ts: Utility functions for interaction with DynamoDB
Important utilities and data structures.errors.ts: Shared error types for the project
Important utilities and data structures.lambdas-helpers.ts: Utility functions for use within a Lambda context
Important utilities and data structures.mocha-setup.ts: Configures the environment for running mocha tests
Important utilities and data structures.shared.ts: Functions utilized by multiple lambdas in the src/lambdas directory
Important utilities and data structures.transformers.ts: Functions for thoughtful conversion of data structures

Terraform: Terraform files used for AWS - Correspondence with each lambda in the src/lambdas directory
